Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Snake B-Defensins and Derived Peptides
Literature.Author: Oguiura N, Corrêa PG, Rosmino IL, de Souza AO, Pasqualoto KFM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=55.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=27.7µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=13.9µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=27.7µM),Citrobacter freundii(MIC=110µM),Providencia rettgeri(no activity data),Serratia marcescens(no activity data),Morganella morganii(no activity data),Candida albicans IOC 4525(MIC90=>250µM),Cryptococcus neoformans IOC 4528(MIC90=>250µM),Trichophyton rubrum IOC 4527(MIC90=>250µM),Aspergillus fumigatus IOC 4526(MIC90=>250µM)
